title: Alternatives to Ogg from Village.
content:
Really digging this calligraphic type from Oscar Egg, trying to find alternatives to build up a collection.

Any leads would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks all!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803041125im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-04-17%20at%2011_5230.40.08%20AM.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803041125im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vllg_Incubator_Ogg_PandS_5751.png)
author: BeTheKid
